name: Bobfriend / Fun-sized Bob!
description:
Looks like Bob somehow grew taller, and for some reason, bob wants to fight for girlfriend! Probably not for good reasons though...

Here's Bobfriend! A stupid idea we got yesterday or the day before when we was scrolling through Gamejolt! Fight old and new foes while playing as bob! With new icons and menus!

it should work for ( almost ) every mod!
